data.message: What's more dangerous then a African aware on some level of his or her true enemies , a African that train's his or her body on a day to day bases to operate on a higher level and to have self discipline and to know how to kill with his or her body parts in self defense and attack,What's more dangerous then a African that is a marksman with AR 15's , AK 47's, 50 cal's semi automatic sniper rifles am other small arms, What's more dangerous then A African that study's one's powerful African history that play's root roles in world history and is able to lay plan's on a economical level , political level , and military level and logically execute the plan's to bring it into reality and to lay them in the interest of the African masses, is a ever growing set of small unit's of African's that are well connected, and well organized, operating in like fashion. Anthony X
